description:
A modern and secure instant messaging for people, business and healthcare


[Feature] Chat Window: Improved setting for copying text with or without timestamps and names
[Fixed] Chat Window: Animations now properly disposed of when out of view
[Fixed] Chat Window: Fixed issue where display was locked for updates after copying text
[Fixed] Chat Window: Fixed issue where links and tooltips may not show correctly during partial redraws
[Fixed] Dialog: Fixed issue where some dialogs were not properly cleaned up when closed
[Fixed] Languages: Fixed issue with language packs and settings
[Fixed] Libraries: Updated to latest versions of backing libraries
[Fixed] Reactions: Fixed missing reaction in toolbar for subsequent reactions
[Fixed] Trillian Calls: Updated backend library with many fixes and improvements
